item.description:
Okay, you know you're curious. You've always wanted to attend one of these. So come out to the region's only UFO Conference this October.

There is a certain stigma that people who believe in UFOs are nuts, but this conference is nothing like that at all. This conference is basically a presentation of some of the more fascinating documented cases. Presentations are made in a fair fashion for the listeners to decide what they think happened. It is like watching a Discovery or History Channel documentary in person.

There will be several discussions on the evening by Nick Redfern ("Cosmic UFO Crashes"), Nancy Talbott ("Crop Circles and UFOs") and Peter Robbins ("The Bentwaters Incident"). Other features include "Black Helicopters", "The Air Raid of Los Angeles" and "The 1909 Airship Mystery".

In addition there advocates and representatives from various organizations include MUFON. Vendors will be selling books, t-shirts and other memorabilia. There will also be snacks and drinks available.

Tickets for this event are available through the www.ufoshow.org for $25. You will need to buy your ticket on your own. If you sign up for the New England UFO MeetUp group, http://www.meetup.com... , you can buy your tickets through them. Discounted tickets will be offered to members of this meetup group only. Contact massufoshow@hotmail.com for more details. This is a limited offer for a short time (September 15th). Tickets will also be available at the door on the evening of the event.

So come join me for an interesting evening and leave your foil hat at home.
item.name: UFO Show
